translations: n.种植者；农作物；收割机；修剪机
n.（Cropper）人名；（意）克罗珀尔；（英）克罗珀

sentences.sentence: Superabundance of salinity in the soil imperils the growth of the mass of plants, especially does more harm to croppers which have lower tolerance to salinity.
sentences.translation: 土壤中盐份过多会危害大多数植物的正常生长，尤其对耐盐性较低的农作物危害更大。
